plot: A young man, bitten by a wolf, transforms into a werewolf in the light of the full moon. After a murder spree, during which the werewolf kills a small child and eats a dog, he is killed with a silver bullet fired by his father.
title: The Wolf Man
plot_es: A young man, bitten by a wolf, transforms into a werewolf in the light of the full moon. After a murder spree, during which the werewolf kills a small child and eats a dog, he is killed with a silver bullet fired by his father.
plot_en: A young man, bitten by a wolf, transforms into a werewolf in the light of the full moon. After a murder spree, during which the werewolf kills a small child and eats a dog, he is killed with a silver bullet fired by his father.
